data.title: Gerald Maxwell - Real Estate Agent in Your Area
data.meta_description: Find real estate agent & Realtor® Gerald Maxwell in your city on Realtor.com®, your source for top rated real estate professionals.
data.text:
Known as an innovative problem solver who is always professional and continuously committed to his clients' needs. Gerald has built upon his continued success by combining unparalleled service, innovative marketing and attention to detail. Gerald embodies all the finest qualities in today's real estate professional. His high energy, enthusiasm and commitment to service produce successful results time and time again.

*Extensive experience as a Real Estate Team Leader and Broker

*Continues to serve in numerous leadership roles at the Huntsville Area Associaiton of Realtors including Task Forces, Orientation Committees, Forms Committee and MLS Committee.

*Member of the Alabama Association of Realtors

*Member of the National Association of Realtors

*Accredited Buyers' Specialist

*Held Advanced Accreditations as a Cartus Mobility Affinity Specialist, as a Home Marketing Specialist, as an Inventory Specialist, as a Referral Specialist, and as a Certified A-Team agent

*Numerous Awards and Recognition for high real estate productivity

*Holds undergraduate and graduate degrees in psychology

*Adjunct professor of psychology last 12 years

*Water Safety Instructor for American Red Cross, teaching children & adults for 30 years (mostly at UA of Huntsville)

*Eagle Scout award and Vigil Honor in Boy Scouts of America

*Husband and proud father of two

*Lifelong resident of the Huntsville/Madison area
